Real Name: Wade Wilson
Special Powers
FLOATIES FOR EVERYONE!: Adjacent friendly characters have [Dolphin movement symbol].
MY HEALING FACTOR IS MOSTLY BATTLING SUNBURN: At the end of your turn, heal Deadpool 1 click.
WHAT PART OF "POOL" DIDN'T YOU UNDERSTAND?: Phasing/Teleport. // FREE: Generate up to 4 water terrain markers in squares within range and line of fire. At the beginning of your next turn (even if lost), remove them.

November 30, 2022
CaptainAmerica1945
I think perhaps restating this but I digress, sure Deadpool should be really hard to take down in this instance this is more utility and support in regards to forcing your opponent to get in close to be able to target your pieces excluding a few pieces that use a high range pulsewave and or unique targeting ability. Given the potential access to either witches and now Leach you force your opponent to get close and then simply turn off their powers-- I understand that Deadpool should be close to invincible being cursed by Thanos-- not being able to die and all but this is hero clix and he get a splinter of what he should actually be plus it is more a gimmick to begin with so yeah. A fun piece which I look forward to trying out; at the very least it should annoy your opponent but perhaps not to the extent of a piece like Anarky -- now that was was annoying and gross... Like chess this piece forces your opponent to close the gap and pay for it.

October 28, 2022
tidge
Gimmick? Yes. Random Garbage? Absolutely not, in an era in which :m-swim: characters occupying water terrain cannot be targeted by opposing characters more than 4 squares away. Consider that this figure could put an adjacent 2x2 self-healing colossal figure (e.g. 30-point Dark Phoenix) into the "pool", or do the same for more than one single-based figures, and that is one heck of a trick. My one regret is that the LE Pogg Ur-Pogg is 270 points at top-dial, because he seems exactly like the type of guy to pal around with Wade Wilson.

Then in 2012-2013 wolverine and the x -men came out, and I spent $200 on a case to hopefully pull a new Deadpool.(keep in mind this was before Scott Porter did his stupid unboxing Bs and HC realms didn't know anything about what was coming out untill the pieces fully released. But 20 boosters opened later and no new Deadpool at all was in the set... But I was happy when my favorite marvel character Fantomex made the scene again from a Long break ( WXM FANTOMEX FAVE PIECE) THEN ALONG came the Deadpool video game and wiz kids jumped on the band wagon and made a whole set dedicated to wade Winston Wilson(aka) the merc with a mouth (aka) Deadpool. And the pieces flowed like water. (LE 100 DP being my fave piece in that set) but I got all the mercs sculpts.. then.. from there on our it's been a Deadpool , here and there every where .
